alert.note: Alert for Pribilof Islands (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 30 at 2:21AM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...STRONG WINDS COMBINED WITH PERIODS OF HEAVY SNOW FOR THE PRIBILOF ISLANDS THROUGH TUESDAY EVENING... A compact storm system from Siberia is forecast to track across the Pribilof Islands through the day Tuesday, bringing periods of heavy snow and strong winds gusting as high as 55 mph. Expect southeasterly winds early this morning shifting to the west in the afternoon. Gusty winds combined with heavy snowfall may reduce visibility to less than one mile at times due to blowing snow. The worst conditions will be brief, likely lasting only a few hours, first early this morning and again this afternoon. This system is expected to bring 2-4 inches of new snowfall to the Pribilofs during this time. Winds and snow showers will taper off tonight as the storm moves toward the Southwest Alaska coast.
